snippet.title: Why Oculus Rift And Virtual Reality Could Be Huge And Not Just For Gamers
snippet.description: VideoOver two decades ago, I was in a theme park near London and in a small room tucked out of the way and with a far smaller queue than any of the vomit-inducing rides outside, sat two large seats with computers built into them. Something like 'Virtual Reality Gaming' was [...] read »

snippet.title: Professional Line Talkers And Flash Mobs Coming Soon To A Queue Near You
snippet.description: Lines — or queues — are an inevitable part of life. People will spend what amounts to two years of their lives just waiting in line, according to time management firm Q-Matic. And we are impatient. Four minutes is the maximum amount of time that shoppers are willing to wait [...] read »

snippet.title: Queue-Tips: Netflix Recovering From Momentary Lapse Of Sanity

snippet.title: Brand Busting? Online and In Stores H&M's Isabel Marant Line Sells Out, Disappoints Customers
snippet.description: The hype had been building for months. snippet.title: Tuck Into Taiwan: An Ultimate Food Tour
